onChange.script:
#Move the row data to the edit data any time the row id changes
	self.custom.edit_data = self.params.row_data

#Move the row data to the edit data any time the row id changes
	self.custom.edit_data = self.params.row_data

config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Service Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshServicesDetail'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.row_id
		time_created = system.date.now()
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
		participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
		employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
		enrollment_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.enrollment_id
		service_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.service_id
		HMIS = self.view.custom.edit_data.HMIS
		quantity = self.view.custom.edit_data.quantity
		comment = self.view.custom.edit_data.comment

	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		if (row_id is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
		elif (participant_id is None) or (int(participant_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Participant ID Error")
		elif (time_created is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Date Error")
		elif (employee_id is None) or (int(employee_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Employee ID Error")
		elif (enrollment_id is None) or (int(enrollment_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Enrollment ID Error")
		elif (service_id is None) or (int(service_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Service ID Error")
		elif (HMIS is None) or (int(HMIS) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("HMIS Selection Error")
		else:
			valid = True
			system.perspective.print("Servcies Detail Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if row_id == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Insert New Data")
				system.perspective.print(HMIS)
				path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailInsert"
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"participant_id":participant_id,
							"employee_id":employee_id,"enrollment_id":enrollment_id, 
							"service_id":service_id,"user_name":user_name,
							"HMIS":HMIS,"quantity":quantity,
							"comment":comment}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
				
				###################################
				# Increment Yearly Services
				total_services = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]RITI/Participants/long_TotalServices"])[0].value
				total_services += 1
				system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]RITI/Participants/long_TotalServices"], [total_services])
				

			
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data
			elif row_id >= 0:#Update existing data on specified row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Update Exisiting Data")
				system.perspective.print(HMIS)
				path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailUpdate"
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"participant_id":participant_id,
							"employee_id":employee_id, "enrollment_id":enrollment_id, 
							"service_id":service_id,"user_name":user_name,
							"HMIS":HMIS,"quantity":quantity,
							"comment":comment,"row_id":row_id}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)			
				#system.perspective.print("Update Data")
			
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh:
				system.perspective.print("Servcies Detail Query Success")
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshServicesDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
		
		
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.")
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Services Detail")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

### Declare parameters
	project = "RITI" 
	row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.row_id
		
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (row_id is None) or (int(row_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			#Delete the Case Note Association before deleting the service
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDeleteAssociations"
			parameters = {"service_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDelete"
			parameters = {"row_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			#system.perspective.print("Delete Service")
			##### Refresh the table
			#if Refresh:	
			#	system.perspective.print("Query Success")
			#else:
				#system.perspective.print("Query Fail")
				#system.perspective.print(Refresh)
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshServicesDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
			
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

config.expression:
'Created:' + 
{view.custom.edit_data.time_created} + 
', Participant:' + 
{view.custom.edit_data.participant_id} + 
', Employee:' +
{view.custom.edit_data.employee_id} +
', Enrollment:' +
{view.custom.edit_data.enrollment_id} + 
', Service:' +
{view.custom.edit_data.service_id} +
', Row:' +
{view.custom.edit_data.row_id} +
', Commenrs:' +
{view.custom.edit_data.comment}
